title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Process for Fostering Reflective Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding elementary mathematical concepts and basic awareness of design thinking processes
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Iterative Reflective Activities for Real-Life Mathematics Problem Solving: Personal Device Utilization and Small-Group Collaborative Learning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform reflective thinking at least three times across the three stages (initiation-execution-closure) of the design process
Learners can accurately identify and propose improvements for over 80% of errors occurring during problem-solving processes
Learners can analyze their thinking patterns through reflective journaling and submit revised versions incorporating peer feedback with 90% probability
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
